credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Fire Screen:  The Sense of Taste
medium: Etching, printed from two plates, hand colored with brush and watercolor on paper
description: Screen design depicting two Chinese boys, one eating a slice of melon, while the other points his finger and holds a melon still attached to the tree above them. Image framed by rocaille design with vegetal and floral motifs.
name: Print
